data.proxyObjectName: yellow rectangular cleaning sponge with green scrub side
data.utilizationMethod: Place the sponge flat on the surface with the yellow soft side facing upward; deliver the downward blow to the center of that surface.

data.proxyObjectName: black and grey cushioned office chair
data.utilizationMethod: No method available for this object

data.proxyObjectName: folded umbrella with black and white checkered fabric and curved handle
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the curved handle with a relaxed full-hand grip so the folded shaft extends forward

data.proxyObjectName: white table fan with protective grill and round base
data.utilizationMethod: Grasp the neck column just below the grill with one hand, lift the fan clear of the desk, and swing the heavy grill end downward like an axe head.

data.proxyObjectName: large Apple iMac desktop monitor with silver stand
data.utilizationMethod: Slip one hand around the thin neck of the silver stand close to the base and swing the screen forward and downward in a short arc while maintaining that grip.

data.proxyObjectName: white spray bottle filled with blue liquid
data.utilizationMethod: Clasp the cylindrical neck just below the trigger, point the nozzle outward, and sweep the bottle in repeated inward arcs.
